name: travel_delays
rows: Roadwork on US 322 eastbound between Exit: PA 452 NORTH and VIETNAM VETERANS MEMOR HW. There is a lane restriction.

Road work on I-76 East. The right lane is closed.
Utility work on PIONEER RD / FRANKLIN RD both directions between MARS CRIDER RD and HILLMONT DR, MARS RD. There is a lane restriction.
Utility work on PA 124 both directions at FREYSVILLE RD. There is a traffic disruption.
Roadwork on US 220 both directions at KELLOGG RD. There is a lane restriction.
Vehicle recovery/follow up on I-70 westbound .5 miles west of Exit 49: SMITHTON. There is a shoulder closed.
Crash on I-95 northbound 1.1 miles south of Exit 20: COLUMBUS BLVD/WASHINGTON AVE. There is a lane restriction.
Crash on I-80 eastbound between Exit 293: I-380 NORTH - SCRANTON and 1 miles WEST of Exit 299: PA 715 - TANNERSVILLE. There is a lane restriction.

Utility work on OLIVE ST / THIRTEENTH AV both directions between SEVENTEENTH AV and CALN RD. All lanes closed.
